name: Tridea Partners
description: Tridea Partners is a leading service provider of Microsoft Dynamics including Microsoft Dynamics GP, Microsoft Dynamics AX and Microsoft Dynamics CRM for the San Diego, Orange County, Los Angeles and San Francisco markets. Tridea helps companies implement ERP applications, CRM solutions, accounting software and business applications through a proven and experienced approach. Tridea Partners is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and Microsoft President's Club Member.
